channel.title: Got a Compile problem
channel.description:
So I installed Java DK 6.0 and I downloaded a server. I pasted the server files into the bin file where the javac file was located. When I execute the compilter.bat file, it does not start but the following text appears in command prompt:
Note: Stream.java uses or overrides a depricated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Finished! Press any key to continue...
And then cmd.exe closes. And it does not compile at all. Any1 that could help me, I'm new to java and runescape servers. Thank you

item.title: Got a Compile problem
item.dc:creator: @abeke abeke
item.description:
@abeke wrote:

The server I downloaded from this forum, Called Gangstascape v4

The compiler code:

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 18, 2008, 06:24:10 am[/size][hr]I got it running, the runserver command assumes that java can be found via the PATH environment variable.

Read full topic

item.title: Got a Compile problem

item.description:
@abeke wrote:

So I installed Java DK 6.0 and I downloaded a server.
I pasted the server files into the bin file where the javac file was located.
When I execute the compilter.bat file, it does not start but the following text appears in command prompt:

Note: Stream.java uses or overrides a depricated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Finished!
Press any key to continue…

And then cmd.exe closes. And it does not compile at all.
Any1 that could help me, I’m new to java and runescape servers.
Thank you
